name: Move IT, a Ludum Dare 49 game
name_original: Move IT, a Ludum Dare 49 game
description:
Hop into the shoes of moving company truck driver and try to get that extremely UNSTABLE cargo to it’s destination!

A Ludum Dare 49 compo entry, theme was unstable.

How to play:

  • WASD to move, Spacebar to brake. F for action.
  • Yellow arrow will point to the destination (straight line, you'll have to find your own way there).
  • Objective is to transport items for customers from old apartment to new
  • Once you reach the starting building for mission, you can load as many packages as you wish to your truck (by pressing F). You can move your truck after the first package to better align it for the next ones.
  • Points are given by packages delivered to destination.
